title: The Louvre (PC)
brief_description: Take an armchair trip through le Grand Louvre in Paris and discover why it is one of the world’s great museums. There is the option of taking guided tours of the masterpieces and being provided with narration, a history of the building and playing the cour caree game where you can reassemble paintings to your own specifications. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: 486 DX or higher (Pentium recommended), Windows 3.1 or higher, 8 MB of RAM, 4Mb hard drive space, 2x speed CD-ROM drive (4x recommended), 640x480 screen, 256 colors (32,000 recommended).
